definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Then, he was taking two bags of green Chinese onion to come to that place.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他带着两袋大葱来到了那的地方。

sentences.english: Green onions cut into 3 cm-long segment, ginger cut into thin slices.
sentences.chinese: 大葱切成3厘米长的段，姜切成薄片。

sentences.english: Mushroom, Mung bean, tomato souse with onions and herbs .
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇，绿豆，番茄酱，洋葱和大葱。

sentences.english: And potato, rice cakes, green onions, ginger, and fry.
sentences.chinese: 和山芋，年糕，大葱，生姜等一起炒。

sentences.english: Please wrap the Beijing Duck in the pancake with the spring onion and the sweet bean sauce.
sentences.chinese: 请把烤鸭肉加上大葱和甜面酱卷有煎饼里吃。

sentences.english: Slice pieces lengthwise as thinly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 然后将大葱尽可能的切细。

sentences.english: Fried rice with sweet beans, bean curd, leek, eggs and ginger.
sentences.chinese: 超级棒的炒饭，有豌豆，香干，大葱，生姜。

definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
